Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection after the execution of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total waiting time to the SW-Awaiting AE Assignment following Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Time from SW-Checklist Completed to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-EIC Reject in variants ending with rejection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Average time until SW-Awaiting AE Assignment is performed after Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-Awaiting EIC Decision across all variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time it takes SW-AE Assign Reviewers after the execution of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in variants that include reviewer reminders versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and the end of case where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 occurs

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in complex revision paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to SW-EIC Major Revision in multi-round revision cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting AE Assignment and the final decision activity (e.g., SW-EIC Accept, SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Minimum waiting time to the SW-Awaiting AE Assignment when preceded by SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average time for SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs within 7 days versus later
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Initial Reviewer Selection after SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in high-performance variants (performance < 500000)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'
